description: Try our easy to follow Milk Choc-Chip Cookie Ice Cream Sandwiches recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Milk Choc-Chip Cookie Ice Cream Sandwiches
name: Milk Choc-Chip Cookie Ice Cream Sandwiches Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Place a cookie on serving platter, top with 1 scoop of ice-cream. Top with another cookie. Repeat with remaining biscuits and ice-cream.
